sentences: On Article 6 (education, training and public awareness), the Secretariat presented a synthesis report on four regional workshops ( FCCC/SBI/2006/17 ) and parties views on advancing work on CC:iNet the prototype information network clearinghouse ( FCCC/SBI/2006/MISC.15 ).
UNEP reported on relevant Article 6 activities.
Many parties commended these reports. SWITZERLAND advised pursuing synergies between capacity building and Article 6.
Informal consultations will be conducted by Marie Jaudet (France).
